last_episode_to_air.name: The Crying Game
last_episode_to_air.overview: When a crucial plot falters, Vikrant intensifies his ruse with Purva ahead of her show. But even careful planning can't prepare him for what’s coming.

name: Yeh Kaali Kaali Ankhein
overview: Relentlessly pursued by a powerful politician’s daughter who will do anything to make him hers, a man slips down a dark, risky path to reclaim his life.

episodes.name: Teri Baari Hai
episodes.overview: College graduate Vikrant’s plans for his future are upended when an infamous politician offers him a job at the behest of his infatuated daughter, Purva.

episodes.name: Band Toh Bajega
episodes.overview: Reeling from what he witnessed in Akheraj’s office, Vikrant tells Purva his truth, but ensuing events make it clear he can’t get away so easily.

episodes.name: Bandook Aur Hawaii Chappal
episodes.overview: An increasingly desperate Vikrant makes several attempts to call off the engagement. An honest conversation with Akheraj has a disastrous outcome.

episodes.name: 4 Goliyaan
episodes.overview: A shocking discovery leaves Vikrant heartbroken. Now just days before the wedding, fear for his family’s life compels him to make a decision.

episodes.name: Do You Love Me?
episodes.overview: On the wedding night, Vikrant learns of an unexpected return. As his hunger for revenge deepens, a daring side of him begins to emerge.

episodes.name: Jack and Jill
episodes.overview: As Purva's suspicions grow, Akheraj’s men are sent to track down Vikrant’s secret. Vikrant considers putting a dangerous plot into action.

episodes.name: Seedha Sa Plan
episodes.overview: As Purva lets down her guard, Vikrant suggests a honeymoon — but has ulterior motives. However, he's not the only one making life-changing arrangements.

episodes.name: The Crying Game
episodes.overview: When a crucial plot falters, Vikrant intensifies his ruse with Purva ahead of her show. But even careful planning can't prepare him for what’s coming.
